name: Tap The Heck Out of Your Phone!
name_original: Tap The Heck Out of Your Phone!
description:
Tap The Heck Out of Your Phone! (THOYP!!!)

or

Click the heck out of Your Mouse?

Win condition, score 15 (for android its 20) or more within 50 taps...

Just a simple idea inspired by some other tapping games for phones.

The game supposes to be a bit hard, tests your reflex.

Heads Up: I still need more testing with different versions of Android OS, so I can not guarantee that the game will run on all devices smoothly ( due to compatibility issue with Graphics API Level), so if you try it out and give little feedback, that will help me to learn a lot, TIA.
